page.title: 14FESTIVALS AND GALAS DUNLOP
page.content: SINCE 1976 THERE HAS BEEN AN ANNUAL FETE AT HAPLAND MILL WHICH IS HELD TO RAISE MONEY FOR THE UNIFORMED GROUP. EVERY YEAR THE FETE HAS A NAME. IN 1976 IT WAS THE "SPONSORED SPORTS" AND IN 1985 IT WAS "DUNLOP BOULIVARD". AT THE FETE THERE ARE LOTS OF STALLS WITH BAKING,DRINKS ETC. EVERY YEAR THERE IS A GALA DAY.ON THIS DAY A QUEEN IS CROWNED BY THE PREVIOUS QUEEN.THE QUEEN IN 1977 WAS JEANETTE PICKEN AND THE QUEEN IN 1985 IS SARAH MOODY. EVERY YEAR THE SCHOOL HAS A CONCERT , IN 1984 THE THEME WAS INSECTS. EVERY YEAR SINCE 1953 THE WOMANS GUILD HAVE HELD A CAFE CHANTANT;A CAFE IS A PLACE WHERE YOU CAN HAVE A DRINK AND SOMETHING TO EAT.CHANTANT IS FRENCH FOR SINGING AND DRAMA.THE MONEY THAT THEY MAKE IS HALVED AND HALF THEY KEEP AND THE REST GOES TO THE CHURCH.
